title: Universe Sandbox 2 - Alpha 19
description:
[center]https://extraimago.com/image/wMCD[/center]

[center][color=red][font=Impact]Universe Sandbox 2[/font][/color][/center]

Universe Sandbox Â² is developed by Giant Army and published by Giant Army. It was released in Summer 2015.

Universe Sandbox Â² is a physics based space simulator that merges real-time gravity, climate, collision, and material interactions to reveal the beauty of our universe and the fragility of our planet. Itâ€™s the long awaited sequel to the original Universe Sandbox.Walk and fly around your simulations, melt planets with a giant laser, then grab and hurl them out of the solar system with a flick of the wrist.
 
Universe Sandbox Â² includes the desktop version and a new VR mode with support for the HTC Vive & Steam VR. This is a free, automatic update.


[font=Arial][b][size=5]What can you do with Universe Sandbox Â² ?[/size][/b][/font]



[left][b][size=4]Simulate Gravity[/size][/b]
N-body simulation at almost any speed using Newtonian mechanics. Real science, real physics, no supercomputer required.[/left]

[right][img]https://extraimago.com/image/wMCp[/img][/right]

[left][size=4][b]Collide Planets & Stars[/b][/size]
Epic, mind blowing collisions of massive planetary bodies.
[/left]

[right][img]https://extraimago.com/image/wMCr[/img][/right]

[left][b][size=4]Model Earth's Climate[/size][/b]
Watch sea ice grow and recede with the seasons because of the tilt of the Earth: change the tilt and change the seasons. Or move the Earth farther from the Sun and freeze the entire planet.[/left]

[right][img]https://extraimago.com/image/wMCG[/img][/right]


[left][b][size=4]Terraform Planets[/size][/b]
Terraform Planets[/left]

[right][img]https://extraimago.com/image/wMCP[/img][/right]

[left][b][size=4]Deform Surfaces[/size][/b]
Impact planets with asteroids and comets and leave behind massive, molten craters.[/left]

[right][img]https://extraimago.com/image/wMCX[/img][/right]

[left][b][size=4]Supernova a Star[/size][/b]
Make a star evolve by cranking up its age or mass, then watch a supernova unfold.[/left]

[right][img]https://extraimago.com/image/wMCg[/img][/right]

[left][b][size=4]And more...[/size][/b]
[list=1]
[*]Material System - build planets out of Hydrogen, Iron, Rock, & Water
[*]Solar flares & volatile trails
[*]Procedurally generated stars and planets
[*]Pulsars
[*]Light-warping black holes
[*]Dark matter
[/list]
[/left]

[right][img]https://extraimago.com/image/wMC5[/img][/right]
